title: U.N. experts allege systemic racism and rights abuses in U.S. prisons
description: In “an affront to human dignity,” prisoners have been forced to give birth in chains and Black prisoners face disproportionate rights violations, a U.S. report finds.

title: Ukraine hits Russia’s Kursk region repeatedly with airstrikes
description: Russian regions in the west of the country have worked to bolster their air defenses as Ukrainian forces grow more brazen.

title: Young people in China call themselves ‘special forces’ of budget travel
description: The holiday starting on Friday tests if Chinese tourists will return to lavish spending amid an economic slowdown. Many young travelers are opting for more cost-friendly options.

title: Britain’s full-frontal nude dating show sparks U.S. debate as it tops Max
description: ‘Naked Attraction’ is finding a new U.S. audience as it tops streaming service Max, formerly HBO Max, with some calling it educational and others pornographic.

title: In photos: Blast kills dozens at religious gathering in Pakistan
description: At least 43 people were killed and dozens injured Friday in a blast targeting a Pakistani procession to mark the birthday of prophet Muhammad, local police said in a statement, as authorities cautioned that the death toll was likely to rise.

title: Who is Robert Fico? Pro-Russia populist is favored in Slovakia elections.
description: The most-watched figure in the Saturday vote is a former prime minister who was forced out of office five years ago amid outrage over a journalist’s slaying.

title: Blast hits prophet’s birthday celebration in Pakistan, killing at least 20
description: Another 50 people were injured in the blast. Police have yet to assign blame or say how the attack on the celebration was carried out.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Ukrainian drone hits Russian power substation near border, official says
description: Russia said a drone dropped explosives on a substation in Belaya near the border with Ukraine. Poland denied that its aircraft violated the aisrpace of Belarus.

title: Sudan’s diaspora sends home aid as world’s attention drifts
description: As Sudan struggles for a place on relief budgets, its diaspora could become an increasingly important source of aid amid grinding conflict.

title: Can the U.N. really regulate the power — and danger — of AI?
description: Plans for a new U.N. agency on artificial intelligence will be a crucial test for the global system.
